Plot: A man who never has enough time for the things he wants to do is offered the opportunity to have himself duplicated.
Title: Multiplicity
Actors: Michael Keaton, Andie MacDowell, Zack Duhame, Katie Schlossberg
Writer: Chris Miller (short story), Chris Miller (screenplay), Mary Hale (screenplay), Lowell Ganz (screenplay), Babaloo Mandel (screenplay)
